ComicInfo.Summary:
Before Mac and Mabel can ride off into the sunset, all they have to do is evade the lawmen out to kill them. All accounts will be settled in the conclusion to this bloody love story!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | John Cassaday | 1 | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Black & White Variant Cover | John Cassaday | 2 |
